name: 10 Minute Salsa Chicken
description: Absolutely easy, quick, nutritious, and delectable!

ingredients.name: medium tomato or 1/2 cup canned diced tomatoes

preparation: Dice tomato. Toss together tomato, chicken, beans, and salsa mix in Rectangular Steamer.
Cover; microwave on high for 5 min, or until chicken is cooked through.
Dish up with a warm tortilla.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
